text:
Hi all,

thanks for the great package. Nilearn looks really great. I'm sure many people will find it useful in the future. Very cool stuff!

Offending line:
https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/blob/master/nilearn/decoding/searchlight.py#L166

I'll file a PR soon.

kind regards,
 Matthias
title: BUG: searchlight scoring parameter not correctly passed on
BUG: searchlight scoring parameter not correctly passed on

text: Thanks for the report. I am however closing this as a "won't fix", given that, if I understand things right, it works under more recent versions of scikit-learn.
